title: How to Watch Movies on a PlayStation 3

steps.title: Put your DVD or Blu-ray disc into the PS3.
steps.content: Put your DVD or Blu-ray disc into the PS3. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Start the movie.
steps.content: Start the movie. Normally the movie should start itself. If not, go to the video section in your XMB menu and press the X button on the title of your movie to start it up. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Log in to the PS3 Network.
steps.content: Log in to the PS3 Network. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Setup your account.
steps.content: Setup your account. [5] X Research source

steps.title: You get a one-month trial, but you still need to enter credit card information.
steps.content: You get a one-month trial, but you still need to enter credit card information.

steps.title: Choose your film, and start it.
steps.content: Choose your film, and start it.

steps.title: Plug in a USB flash drive with movies on it.
steps.content: Plug in a USB flash drive with movies on it.

steps.title: Go to the video section in the XMB and load the film you are going to watch.
steps.content: Go to the video section in the XMB and load the film you are going to watch.
